## We build a linear regression below.

Simple linear regression is of the form $$Y_i = \beta_0 + \beta_1X_i + \varepsilon_i$$
where $\varepsilon_i \sim N(0,\sigma^2)$, with $\sigma$ be a constant.

```{r}
fit = lm(dist ~ speed, data = cars)
b = coef(summary(fit))
plot(fit)
```

The slope of the regression is `r b[2, 1]`.
